mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.parent_id, c.comment_content, c.create_time, c.from_uid, c.to_uid, u.nickname AS from_nickname, u.avatar, r.nickname AS to_nickname FROM t_comment c JOIN t_user u ON c.from_uid = u.id JOIN t_user r ON c.to_uid = r.id WHERE c.is_check=1 AND parent_id=#{parentId} ORDER BY c.create_time DESC LIMIT #{limit},#{size}
